# ApiClient.SetInfoBoxStatusMessage method

Sets a message in the infobox's textfield zone.

```csharp
public void SetInfoBoxStatusMessage(string[] message, int timeout = 30)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| message | The message to be set into the textfield, where each element of the array is a line of text. |
| timeout | The number of seconds to wait for a response that the SetInfoBoxStatusMessage request was processed. |
